overview: A young man named Josef visits a dilapidated Sanatorium to see his father Jakob.  On his arrival, a sinister doctor informs him that his father had stopped breathing but hasn't died yet, perhaps due to Josef's arrival which may have halted time in the sanatorium.  Josef undertakes a strange journey through the many rooms of the sanatorium, each which conjures worlds composed of his memories, dreams and nightmares.
title: The Hourglass Sanatorium
